item.title: The problem with inflammatory foods
item.description: Over 2000 years ago, Hippocrates, widely considered the father of medicine, believed that “all disease begins in the gut”. It would seem he was on to something. In 2020, I kept a log of the food I ate and the effects its had on my digestive system. From this observation, I’ve been able to identify several foods that I’m sensitive to. I decided to remove gluten from my diet for a month to see the effects it would have.
